Over the last two weeks if your into computer (console) sports games you know it has been football week. Yeah I know it is fricking August, but it is football season for the fat ass joystick jocks. I was immediately wowed by Sega, then I was even more impressed with Madden. Of course on the boards I frequent like urlLink DSP and urlLink Operation Sports debates sprung up like strippers at my uncles house in 87 (don't ask). I now find myself in daily arguments with people who claim to be unbiased but (get this) prefer game A. I've been called a Madden fanboy, and ESPN ass-hat and my personal favorite a whinny dick. See I have an addiction, I have to argue with people who claim to be unbiased, but really aren't. There are whole boards full of them. They proudly thump their chests and say "We don't use words like fanboy here! Because we are gamers" To that I say bloody bullshit! These guys jump all over anyone who post anything negative about their game of choice, but will happily allow "the other games" threads to be opened, which of course slam "the other game" and it is no problem. In fact they will use their passive - aggressive arguments like "I think both games are great, and by the way here are 12 reason why Madden sucks!" To join in on the fun. Yet they are not alone, go to a place like urlLink MaddenMania and get the exact same treatment if you slam Madden. But at least these guys aren't trying to hide the fact they are biased, I mean it is called MaddenMania. So next time you see a post that says I'm a gamer and not loyal to any product, tell them to go screw!
